About

Yichen Ma

Ph.D. Candidate at Georgia Institute of Technology

  • (2024-2029) Ph.D. ISyE, Georgia Tech
  • (2021-2024) B.S. ISyE, Georgia Tech

Sketch

Yichen Ma is a Ph.D. Candidate majoring in Industrial and System Engineering at Georgia Institute of Technology advised by Professor Jianjun (Jan) Shi. My current research interest is in System Informatics and Control.

Awards

  • President’s Undergraduate Research Award (2022)

  • President’s Undergraduate Research Award (2023)

  • Undergraduate Poster Award, Georgia Statistics Days (2023)
